posts.post_title: Looking for Waddell Portrait - centered, grade 2-4
posts.post_content:
I’m looking to add my first Waddell to my PC and would like to start with a nicely centered T206 Portrait, maybe grade 2-4.

Message me if you have one to move - thx!

Jeff
